welcome_message_body: Welcome to Marawi City, the beautiful and vibrant heart of Lanao del Sur! Get ready to experience the rich culture, warm hospitality, and stunning landscapes that this city is known for. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Marawi has to offer.

restaurants.name: Diner Dash
restaurants.description: Diner Dash is a diner located in Marawi City.
restaurants.address: Bangon, Marawi City, Lanao del Sur

restaurants.name: Al-Kauthar Shawarmahan
restaurants.description: Al-Kauthar Shawarmahan is a middle eastern restaurant located in Marawi City.
restaurants.address: Gomisa Avenue, Marawi City (Quezon Avenue), 9700 Marawi City, Lanao del Sur

restaurants.name: Jeco's cafe
restaurants.description: Jeco's cafe is a filipino restaurant located in Marawi City.
restaurants.address: MSU commercial Center (Commercial Center, MSU), 9700 Marawi City, Lanao del Sur

restaurants.name: Max Sarap
restaurants.description: Max Sarap is a bbq joint located in the city.

restaurants.name: Sugar And Spice
restaurants.description: Sugar And Spice is a comfort food restaurant located in Marawi City.
restaurants.address: Sarimanok, 9700 Marawi City, Lanao del Sur
